subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
Labor
lead_paragraph: Clubs sign mediocre free-agent pitchers to ridiculous contracts because they can afford to. Who needs to put a lid on salaries and payrolls when everyone is doing so well?
snippet: Clubs sign mediocre free-agent pitchers to ridiculous contracts because they can afford to. Who needs to put a lid on salaries and payrolls when everyone is doing so well?
